text: Williston is a surname. Notable people with the name include: *David Williston (1868-1962), American landscape architect * Edward Bancroft Williston (1837-1920), officer in the United States Army * George H. Williston (1818-1881), an American state and territorial legislator * Lorenzo P. Williston (1815-1887), American lawyer and politician * Ray Gillis Williston (1914-2006), Canadian educator and politician * Samuel Wendell Williston (1851-1918), an American paleontologist * Samuel Williston (1861-1963), American lawyer
title: Williston (surname)
